content: have been worked and 12 14 14 16 18 20 22 sts remain next row rs k gusset the sock gusset is formed by picking up sts set up row along the edges of the heel flap then working in the round while decreasing row 1 rs sl1 k to end row 2 ws sl1 p to end along the edge of the heel flap pick up 10 10 12 14 16 18 20 sts pm k across top eye of partridge heel of foot pm pick up 10 10 12 14 16 18 20 sts along the edge of the heel flap k6 7 7 8 row 1 rs sl 1 k1 to end 9 10 11 place new bor marker this is row 2 ws sl 1 p to end where you will join cc if you are working row 3 sl 1 sl1 k1 to last st k1 in stripes 50 54 60 70 80 88 98 sts row 4 sl 1 p to end round 1 k to marker k across top of foot to marker k to bor work row 1-4 of the eye of partridge heel round 2 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm pattern for a total of 3 3 4 5 6 7 8 times k across top of foot to marker sm k1 ssk k to then work row 1 and 2 once more this is bor 16 16 20 24 28 32 36 row work rnds 1-2 a total of 7 7 8 9 10 12 13 times this is 14 14 16 18 20 24 26 rnds heel turn 36 40 44 52 60 64 72 sts the heel is turned by working a series of short row foot shift bor remove marker keep a marker in set up row 1 rs sl1 k10 12 12 14 16 place here if you are working in stripes 18 20 ssk k1 turn k9 10 11 13 15 16 18 sts replace bor set up row 2 ws sl1 p5 7 5 5 5 7 7 this is the new bor keep the 2nd marker p2tog p1 turn after the top of foot in place ollie socks 3 ©stitches and wool 2025 continue working in the round until the grafting piece measures 2 5 3 4 6 7 8 5 10 from set up back of heel or 0 75 1 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 thread your tail on a darning needle put 1 5 short of desired foot length your darning needle through the first st on the front needle as if to purl and pull toe the yarn through leaving the st on the the toe is shaped by decreases then grafted needle closed 2 put your darning needle through the first st on the back needle as if to knit and pull round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts
